amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to increase funding for EERE's Facilities and Infrastructure account by $5 million offset by a $5 million reduction to DOE's Departmental Administration account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perlmutter amendment (A039) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Perlmutter.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perlmutter amendment (A039) Failed by voice vote.
